description: It downloads the original track from youtube, like mp4 or opus, but it doesn't convert to mp3.

Been using it for some time with no problems whatsoever.
Thoroughly recommend it.

I would give this app 5 stars if it downloaded audio files and included the tag file info plus the image file from the YouTube site. (This is what youtube-dl gui does.) In any case, the interface is well set up and clear.

YouTube Downloader Plus *does* download video with audio (unlike FreeTube) and you have a lot of choices as to the resolution of the video and /or audio file. Processing is lightning fast, even on my crappy old Linux hardware. I also appreciate the inclusion of a dark theme. Kudos to the programmer(s) of this app.
summary: Yet another great YouTube+ downloading app!

description: A really handy tool. One feature I really like is the ability to download ranges.

Fast, reliable and it downloads foreign films with all CC available impeccably.
Hopefully it will be kept up to date for the future. 
Well worth supporting.

Works great for most video sites I've tried. For CNBC I had to resort back to using 9xbuddy website and another I had to stream to file with VLC. Still the best desktop app that I'm aware of, highly recommend.
Lastima que no la descubri antes,muy buena para descarga musica y videos en la maxima calidad que se puede descargar en youtube. Espero que dure.
summary: Descarga videos y musica de youtube y youtubemusic
